citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The individually housed adult female common marmoset that cannot see or hear other nonhuman primates has been
receiving additional enrichment since the death of their cagemate on 2 June 2023, but does not have a written plan for
additional enrichment in the environmental enhancement plan approved by the attending veterinarian as required for this
special consideration animal. Individually housed nonhuman primates that are unable to see and hear nonhuman
primates of their own or compatible species may develop self-injurious behavior or poor psychological well-being. Certain
nonhuman primates must be provided special attention regarding enhancement of their environment, based on the needs
of the individual species and in accordance with instructions of the attending veterinarian.
Correct by 15 August 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

3.81(c)(4) 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The individually housed adult female common marmoset that cannot see or hear other nonhuman primates has been 
receiving additional enrichment since the death of their cagemate on 2 June 2023, but does not have a written plan for 
additional enrichment in the environmental enhancement plan approved by the attending veterinarian as required for this 
special consideration animal. Individually housed nonhuman primates that are unable to see and hear nonhuman 
primates of their own or compatible species may develop self-injurious behavior or poor psychological well-being. Certain 
nonhuman primates must be provided special attention regarding enhancement of their environment, based on the needs 
of the individual species and in accordance with instructions of the attending veterinarian. 
 
Correct by 15 August 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
